company: Winthrop-University Hospital Employees Federal Credit Union
headline: Great Place to Work!
pros: Awesome! I wish I had a chance to be with them longer.
cons: There are no cons, everything at Winthorp was great.

company: Winthrop-University Hospital Employees Federal Credit Union
headline: Terrible Organization

company: Winthrop-University Hospital Employees Federal Credit Union
headline: Too corporate now that NYU took over
pros: Management is terrible and very corporate
cons: Job not secure. They treat you like a number

company: Winthrop-University Hospital Employees Federal Credit Union
headline: Loved it
pros: Great people to work with. Room for growth and learning specifically into loans department.
cons: Small credit union most work is done by tellers. Could use better organization clear outline of things that should be done. There is no formal training for the position its learn as you go which is not very great considering you are going to be held responsible for you errors and that could potentially be held against you.
